title: Ginger fizz
description: Cocktails don't need to be sickly sweet or wildly strong. This cranberry, apple and ginger combination is exceptionally Christmassy.

default: 400g/14oz frozen cranberries, plus extra for decoration
2-4 knobs of preserved stem ginger (depending on how gingery you like it)
3 tbsp syrup from the stem ginger jar

steps: Blend all ingredients except for the cider in a blender.
Pour in the cider and blend again.
Serve in a jug with a few extra frozen cranberries for decoration.
